Literature.Title: Contribution of a central proline in model amphipathic alpha-helical peptides to self-association, interaction with phospholipids, and antimicrobial mode of action.
Literature.Author: Yang ST, Lee JY, Kim HJ, Eu YJ, Shin SY, Hahm KS, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2-4µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2-4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=4-8µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1-4µM)
